name: Sonic Pocket Runners
description:
A small school project made in 5 days. Jump with the Up arrow and try to get to the end, don't forget to look out for the 2 Red Star Rings if you want some extra challenge! I hope you enjoy it!

(It's my first project in both Unity and C+, don't be surprised if there's some glitches)

BGM source: https://youtu.be/_Mu7o-vwX2g
